          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es-EC">Lesson B, Unit 1 Passages (vocab%2B-%2BDescribing%2Bparents%2Band%2Bchildren.doc)</string>
          </title>
          <language>es-EC</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es-EC">TOPICWhat kind of person are you? Every family&acute;s different!FUNCTIONSStating advantages and disadvantages. Talking about rules. Discussing people&acute;s changes and families.GRAMMARNoun clauses after beACTIVITIES DURING THE LESSON1. In pairs, discuss the following quotes, What do you think they mean? do they apply to your life? "I don't care how poor a man is; if he has family, he's rich."Dan Wilcox and Thad Mumford, "Identity Crisis," "Blood's thicker than water, and when one's in troubleBest to seek out a relative's open arms.""Before I got married I had six theories about bringing up children; now I have six children, and no theories."John Wilmot"Your children need your presence more than your presents. "Jesse Jackson"There are two lasting bequests we can give our children.  One is roots.  The other is wings. "Hodding Carter, Jr.2. Are you a family or friend's person? take the next quiz and then compare your answers with a partner A family quiz3. Listening Activity, pg 64. Presentation of the Language: Noun clauses after be. For the grammar explanation and some exercises, go to this web link:  2. Noun clauses. For further practice open the first file attached below.5. Check the different situations posted on the forum. Read and reflect. Post your opinions on the forum6. Vocabulary exercise. Describing parents and children. Do the exercises on the file attached (vocab)7. Think of as many adjectives as you can that best describe the character(s) in each picture:      ___________________________           ______________________     ______________________     ___________________________________________________           ______________________     ______________________     ___________________________________________________            ______________________      ______________________    __________________________8. Do the reading activities on pg 9, post your answers on the forum and send them to me by email.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es-EC">quot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es-EC">your</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es-EC">children</string>
          </keyword>
